root.name: Xena: Warrior Princess - The Talisman of Fate
root.description: 'Talisman of Fate' is a very simple fighting game based on the popular television series 'Xena: Warrior Princess'. The story line involved a talisman that could control mankind, and a tournament hosted by the gods to decide who gets to keep it. The game allowed for up to four players to fight each other in a battle royal, which was a selling point, however in spite of the Xena license being popular at the time, numerous glitches within the game and a slew of bad reviews meant that it enjoyed very little success Â Characters Xena Caesar Gabrielle Ephiny Ares Velasca Callisto Joxer Lao Ma Autolycus
